blogPost.excerpt: OneUp allows you to schedule Google My Business posts for the future, as well as post to multiple Google My Business locations at the same time.
blogPost.body: OneUp allows you to schedule Google My Business posts for the future, as well as post to multiple Google My Business locations at the same time.
blogPost.title: Google My Business post scheduler - Schedule GMB posts and even set them to automatically repeat
blogPost.author: Davis Baer

localize.description: OneUp 允许您为未来安排 Google My Business 帖子，以及同时发布到多个 Google My Business 位置。
localize.tagline: 安排GMB职位，甚至设置它们自动重复。

localize.description: OneUp 允許您爲未來安排 Google My Business 帖子，以及同時發佈到多個 Google My Business 位置。
localize.tagline: 安排GMB職位，甚至設置它們自動重複。

previous.excerpt: Everything you need to achieve your fitness goals: prefilled workout databases that are filterable by equipment & fitness levels, exercise & nutrition logging, calendars, and more.
previous.title: HomeFitness OS - The all-in-one fitness system for Notion

localize.description: 实现你的健身目标所需的一切：预填的锻炼数据库，可通过设备和健身水平过滤，运动和营养记录，日历等。
實現你的健身目標所需的一切：預填的鍛鍊數據庫，可通過設備和健身水平過濾，運動和營養記錄，日曆等。

next.excerpt: Visualize your team's recurring tasks and processes in Slack. Build visual workflows using drag and drop interface and run the workflows to get a bird's eye view into your recurring processes. Sign up with Slack and run your first workflow in <1 min!
next.title: Finisher - Build visual streamlined workflows for your team in Slack

localize.description: 在Slack中可视化您团队的重复性任务和流程。使用拖放界面构建可视化工作流，并运行该工作流，以获得重复性流程的鸟瞰图。注册Slack并在<1分钟内运行您的第一个工作流!
localize.tagline: 在Slack中为你的团队打造可视化的精简工作流程。

localize.description: 在Slack中可視化您團隊的重複性任務和流程。使用拖放界面構建可視化工作流，並運行該工作流，以獲得重複性流程的鳥瞰圖。註冊Slack並在<1分鐘內運行您的第一個工作流!
localize.tagline: 在Slack中爲你的團隊打造可視化的精簡工作流程。
